mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_MOCIDCAGSINF (MOCIDCAGSINFSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ODBNESCODE, NWBNESCODE, REPORTFLAG,ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE ) values (#{MoCIDCagsInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OdBnesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NwBnesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{EtlDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{SourceSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select MOCIDCAGSINFSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ODBNESCODE, NWBNESCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOCIDCAGSINF where MOCIDCAGSINFSEQNO = #{MoCIDCagsInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select MOCIDCAGSINFSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ODBNESCODE, NWBNESCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOCIDCAGSINF
